{"templates": {"default": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 0), size = (55, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 0), size = (200, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (325, 0), size = (200, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (535, 0), size = (105, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], True, "showNever"), "notselected": (25, [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (35, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # key, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (50, 0), size = (55, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # number, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (115, 0), size = (200, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 3), # description, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (325, 0), size = (200, 25), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 4), # language, MultiContentEntryText(pos = (535, 0), size = (105, 25), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 5), # selection, ], False, "showNever") }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 20), gFont("Regular", 20)], "itemHeight": 25 }

from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 40) count = len(self.list) if count > 10: count = 10 offset = 25 * count wsizex = textsize[0] + 80 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset +10 if (640 > wsizex): wsizex = 640 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) listsize = (wsizex - 20, 25 * count) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint((1280-wsizex)/2, (720-wsizey)/(count > 7 and 2 or 3)))

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 10), size = (420, 30), flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), MultiContentEntryPixmap(pos = (10, 5), size = (60, 40), png = 2), ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 25)], "itemHeight": 50 }
from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 30 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] lenlist = len(self.list)*25 if (lenlist > 125): lenlist = 125 if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 10 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(65, 8 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-4, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(2, wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 2)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))
from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 30 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 20) wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] lenlist = len(self.list)*25 if (lenlist > 125): lenlist = 125 if (64 > wsizey): wsizey = 64 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 10 if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(65, 8 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(5, 5 + titleheight)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(53,53)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-4, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(2, wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 2)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))
